name: Darkest Forest: The Legendary Tree Hunt
name_original: Darkest Forest: The Legendary Tree Hunt
description:
What is this game?

A "psychological" survival exploration of the Darkest Forest where many brave adventurers lost while searching for the Legendary Pine Tree. Will you find the Legendary Pine Tree and come back home alive and sane?

How to play

Explore the Darkest Forest for the Legendary Pine Tree, but try not to go completely insane. 

You panic level increases the deeper you go into the forest and at some point you can get a Panic Attack resulting in either unbelievable Overcoming granting you a powerful ability for a short period of time, or nasty Quirk which is going to be permanently upon you activating some terrible effects from time to time.

When close to a Panic Attack, relax at a good old campfire built by your own hands. Fortunately, there is no shortage in wood around here...

Controls Keyboard
  • WASD / Arrow keys - Movement
  • Space - Axe
  • F - Start / stop chilling at bonfire
Gamepad
  • Left stick / D-pad - Movement
  • Cross / A - Axe
  • Square / X - Start / stop chilling at bonfire
Caveats
  • Game has no sound yet
  • Planned multiplayer is not implemented yet
Tools used
  • Unity
  • JetBrains Rider
  • Blender
  • Miro
  • Notion
Credits
  • Kenney game assets pack 
  • Polygon Adventure Pack
